title: FS: T213-2 Bender (tough) & T210 Merritt (both sold)
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: FS: T213-2 Bender (tough) & T210 Merritt (both sold)
posts.post_content:
Prices are net to me and include shipping. My Flickr sale album also has other cards & photos ([url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/132359235@N05/albums/72157719430982559[/url]). Not interested in trades.

Please PM

T213-2 Bender no trees Philadelphia Nat (vert surface crease on right - only visible at angle). Very low pop card: $525 (SOLD)

T210 Merritt: $150 (SOLD)
